thread.title: Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea
thread.title_full: Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea

title: Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea
text:
Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Lexi Thompson of the United States watches her shot on the second hole during the final round of the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Lexi Thompson of the United States poses with the trophy after winning the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Lexi Thompson of the United States watches her shot on the second hole during the final round of the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Lexi Thompson of the United States walks on the sixth green during the final round of the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Sung Hyun Park of South Korea reacts on the sixth hole during the final round of the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Yani Tseng of Taiwan reacts on the sixth hole after a putt during the final round of the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Lydia Ko of New Zealand watches her shot on the second hole during the final round of the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Lee Jin-man Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea 
Lydia Ko of New Zealand reacts on the sixth hole after missing a putt during the final round of the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship golf tournament at Sky72 Golf Club in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/Lee Jin-man) Posted: Sunday, October 18, 2015 4:17 am | Updated: 5:15 am, Sun Oct 18, 2015. Lexi Thompson wins LPGA Tour event in South Korea Associated Press | 
INCHEON, South Korea (AP) — Lexi Thompson broke out of a crowded pack Sunday to win the LPGA KEB Hana Bank Championship for her second victory of the year and sixth overall. 
The 20-year-old American closed with a 3-under 69 to beat Taiwan's Yani Tseng and South Korea's Sung Hyun Park by a stroke on Sky 72's Ocean Course.
